entry.title: Membership disabled due to bounces
entry.summary: The email thread involves a discussion about an issue in the Bitcoin development mailing list. One of the members, Braun Brelin, received a message saying that his membership was disabled due to excessive bounces. However, he claimed to have only sent out one email on the list. Another member, Matt Whitlock, also experienced the same problem and had to re-enable his membership on the list. They wondered if the issue was related to the problems with SourceForge and mail list hosting. The thread ends with the standard footer of the Bitcoin-development mailing list.
